channel.title: [Delta] Out wildy? Rep++
channel.description:
When you go in wildy and back out the wildy sign never leaves, any ideas??
Rep++ :eek:

item.title: [Delta] Out wildy? Rep++

item.description:
@Mayhem2 wrote:

if (isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1)) { int level = ((absY - 3520) / 8) + 1; outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("Level: " + level, 199); } else { sendQuest(" ", 199); setInterfaceWalkable(-1); }

forgot bracket.

Let me test if it works, iâ€™ll rep.

item.title: [Delta] Out wildy? Rep++
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

Search for if (isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1))
You should see

if (isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1)) { if (!hasWildySign) { hasWildySign = true; outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("", 199); } int level = ((absY - 3520) / 8) + 1; if (level != wildyLevel) { wildyLevel = level; sendQuest("Level: " + wildyLevel, 199); } }

Now replace it with this

if (isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1)) { int level = ((absY - 3520) / 8) + 1; outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("Level: " + level, 199); } else { sendQuest(" ", 199); setInterfaceWalkable(-1);

Read full topic
